channel.title: I strongly advise people to get this
channel.description: www.siteadvisor.com I used to have Mc Afree but it interfeired with my internet. But just get the siteadvisor. I love it- helps people not to get viruses alot, try it and see how many you can get lol. Much less i hope. Safe Surfing! ;)

item.title: I strongly advise people to get this
item.dc:creator: @JukuG JukuG
item.description:
@JukuG wrote:

[quote=“ada, post:4, topic:23448”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=35641.msg427704#msg427704 date=1163109581]
nothing like spyware,adware to cleanup other spyware,adware and let you know you have fake spyware/adware
[/quote]

He’s probably the author of the software :D[/quote]

lol.

Why would you slow down your connection even more by using something else that requires more ram and CPU usage…
